verses.verse: Furthermore <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation,<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> whom <S%H259>alone<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen,<s%> is yet <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H7390>tender,<s%> and the <S%H4399>work<s%> is <S%H1419>great:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1002>palace<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> for <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

Now I have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3581>might<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> for things to be made of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver<s%> for things of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H5178>brass<s%> for things of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> the <S%H1270>iron<s%> for things of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and <S%H6086>wood<s%> for things of <S%H6086>wood;<s%> <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and stones to be <S%H4394>set,<s%> <S%H6320>glistering<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and of divers <S%H7553>colors,<s%> and all <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H7893>marble<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance.<s%>

Moreover, <S%H5750><s%> because I have set my <S%H7521>affection<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H3426>have<s%> of mine own proper <S%H5459>good,<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4605>over<s%> and above <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> that I have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%>

Even <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> of the <S%H4480>gold<s%> <S%H2091><s%> of <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2212>refined<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> to <S%H2902>overlay<s%> the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>houses<s%> withal:

The <S%H2091>gold<s%> for things of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver<s%> for things of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and for all <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H4399>work<s%> to be made by the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2796>artificers.<s%> And <S%H4310>who<s%> then is <S%H5068>willing<s%> to consecrate his <S%H4390>service<s%> <S%H3027><s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>

Then the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> with the <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> offered <S%H5068>willingly,<s%>

And <S%H5414>gave<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> and ten <S%H7239>thousand<s%> <S%H150>drams,<s%> and of <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents,<s%> and of <S%H5178>brass<s%> eighteen <S%H7239>thousand<s%> <S%H8083><s%> <S%H505><s%> <S%H3603>talents,<s%> and one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H1270>iron.<s%>

And they <S%H854>with<s%> whom precious <S%H68>stones<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to the <S%H214>treasure<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%> the <S%H1649>Gershonite.<s%>

Then the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> that they offered <S%H5068>willingly,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> with <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> they offered <S%H5068>willingly<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8057>joy.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> our <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H4480>forever<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and <S%H5704>ever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

Thine, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> is the <S%H1420>greatness,<s%> and the <S%H1369>power,<s%> and the <S%H8597>glory,<s%> and the <S%H5331>victory,<s%> and the <S%H1935>majesty:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and in the <S%H776>earth<s%> is thine; thine is the <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and thou art <S%H4984>exalted<s%> as <S%H7218>head<s%> above <S%H3605>all.<s%>

Both <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%> come <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, and <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H4910>reignest<s%> over <S%H3605>all;<s%> and in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H3581>power<s%> and <S%H1369>might;<s%> and in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> it is to make <S%H1431>great,<s%> and to give <S%H2388>strength<s%> unto <S%H3605>all.<s%>
Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H587>we<s%> <S%H3034>thank<s%> thee, and <S%H1984>praise<s%> thy <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> am <S%H589>I,<s%> and <S%H4310>what<s%> is my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> we should be <S%H6113>able<s%> <S%H3581><s%> to offer so <S%H5068>willingly<s%> after this <S%H2063>sort?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> all <S%H3605>things<s%> come <S%H4480>of<s%> thee, and of thine <S%H4480>own<s%> <S%H3027><s%> have we <S%H5414>given<s%> thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H587>we<s%> are <S%H1616>strangers<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and <S%H8453>sojourners,<s%> as were <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H1>fathers:<s%> our <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow,<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H4723>abiding.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1995>store<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> we have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> thee a <S%H1004>house<s%> for thine <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> cometh of thine <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and is <S%H3605>all<s%> thine own.

I <S%H3045>know<s%> also, my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H974>triest<s%> the <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and hast <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in <S%H3476>uprightness.<s%> As for <S%H589>me,<s%> in the <S%H4339>uprightness<s%> of mine <S%H3824>heart<s%> I have willingly <S%H5068>offered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> these <S%H428>things:<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> with <S%H8057>joy<s%> thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> which are <S%H4672>present<s%> <S%H6311>here,<s%> to offer <S%H5068>willingly<s%> unto thee.

O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> in the <S%H3336>imagination<s%> of the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> their <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee:

And <S%H5414>give<s%> unto <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> thy <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> and thy <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> these things, and to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1002>palace,<s%> for the <S%H834>which<s%> I have made <S%H3559>provision.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation,<s%> <S%H4994>Now<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and bowed down their <S%H6915>heads,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> even a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> with their drink <S%H5262>offerings,<s%> and <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> on <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8057>gladness.<s%> And they <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> king the second <S%H8145>time,<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to be the chief <S%H5057>governor,<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> to be <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> as <S%H4428>king<s%> instead <S%H8478>of<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H6743>prospered;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H413><s%> him.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and the mighty <S%H1368>men,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1571>likewise<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H5414>submitted<s%> <S%H3027><s%> themselves <S%H8478>unto<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4605>exceedingly<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5414>bestowed<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him such <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H1935>majesty<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
Thus <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> he in <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> years <S%H4427>reigned<s%> he in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And he <S%H4191>died<s%> in a good old <S%H7872>age,<s%> <S%H2896><s%> <S%H7649>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H6239>riches,<s%> and <S%H3519>honor:<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

Now the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H1697>book<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H7203>seer,<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H1697>book<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H1697>book<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> the <S%H2374>seer,<s%>

With <S%H5973><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4438>reign<s%> and his <S%H1369>might,<s%> and the <S%H6256>times<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> went <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him, and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>countries.<s%>
